para.verbatim:
Collect the messages for the devices to send to
Args: args (Argsparse): Parsed args object args_in (list): List of arguments parsed to the script call timeout_ms (int, optional): Timeout to send. Defaults to 5000.
Raises: Exception: Network or file errors
Returns: bool: True if succeeded.
